# Covid-19 October lockdown exemption certificate generator

![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/license/cynthiahenaff/COVID19-derogation) [![All Contributors](https://img.shields.io/badge/all_contributors-2-orange.svg?style=flat-square)](#contributors-) [![code style: prettier](https://img.shields.io/badge/code_style-prettier-ff69b4.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/prettier/prettier)

[Website](https://attestation-de-deplacement-derogatoire.fr)


##  What is this?

> On october 30th 2020, a second lockdown was enforced in France. In order to be allowed to leave their residence, people are now asked to provide a lockdown exemption certificate. The purpose of this web app is to help generate aforementioned certificates. When using it, no data is sent to any server. All user data is stored client-wise via localStorage.     
> In no instance does it aim to encourage people to leave their house. We value health and safety more than anything. We do not pretend to provide official certificate.  
> The official certificates generator can be found [here](https://github.com/LAB-MI/attestation-deplacement-derogatoire-q4-2020).  
> Stay safe!


## ğŸŒ± Prerequisites

* node >= 10
* yarn

1.  **Installing**

    Install node dependencies.

    ```shell

    ```

    Now you can start it up.

    ```shell
    gatsby develop 
    ```
